message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
else {
    T min = c.iterator().next();
    for (T t : c) {
        if (comp.compare(min, t) > 0) {
            min = t;
        }
    }
    return min;
}
<<<explanation>>>: You cannot create an array of a generic type T. Instead, you can use an Iterator to iterate over the collection. The Iterator.next() method returns the next element in the iteration. In this case, it is used to initialize the min variable with the first element of the collection. Then, a for-each loop is used to iterate over the collection and update the min variable if a smaller element is found.
